Behaviour please fix game, this game is good in theory but in practice it is a buggy, badly balanced mess. Behaviour focuses on pumping out new content and killers with disregard for how many game breaking bugs are caused. They give the illusion of wanting to help with the PTB before updates, but rarely fix any of the bugs which occur before the actual release of the update. Some examples are the blight, who's POV was much lower than it should have been, and took about half a year after release of the killer to fix, and the twins, where they consistently got stuck in the ground before the update was released, and this bug wasn't fix when the update went through. This combined with bad hitboxes and a pretty toxic player base results in a bad game which I wouldn't recommend purchasing

I bought this game back in beta before my computer could handle it. It still is one of my favorite games that I always come back to. The community can be toxic and frustrating at times. However, I cannot recommend this game enough. The graphics are great, with the constant DLC releases there is always something new, or some new perk load out to try. It is hard to get bored of this game. Little bit of a learning curve at first to learn loops, perks, killer powers, etc. I think they've done a pretty good job so far :)
